Event.name: Evoking
Event.definition:
<def-root>Some <fen>Stimulus</fen> causes a <fen>Cognizer</fen> to think of a prior <fen>Phenomenon</fen> due to its perceived similarity.
<ex>I burned down the malt shop where we used to go just because <fex name="Stim">it</fex> <t>reminds</t> me <fex name="Phen">of you</fex></ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Cognizer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person who remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> .</def-root>

Arg.name: Phenomenon
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the mental content that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers.
<ex>You <t>remind</t> me <fex name="Phen">of my uncle Jerry</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Degree</fen> to which <fen>Cognizer</fen> perceives the <fen>Stimulus</fen> to match the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including speed (quickly) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). Other expressions involving how the experience affects the <fen>Cognizer</fen> may also be expressed (painfully).</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the amount of time for which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> continues to remind the Cognizer of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which the <fen>Stimulus</fen> evokes the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the Cognizer remembers the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Stimulus
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity or situation that causes the <fen>Cognizer</fen> to think of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="Stimulus">Internationalization</fex> <t>conjures</t> up a world of diplomatic exchanges and international agencies in which the interests of ex-colonial and great powers still linger</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Feature
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A characteristic of the <fen>Stimulus</fen> that contributes to the perception of similarity to the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex>She <t>reminds</t> me of your mother <fex name="fea">with her darting beady eyes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: remind.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cause someone to think of (something) because of a resemblance

lexUnit.name: evoke.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: bring or recall to the conscious mind

lexUnit.name: recall.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cause one to remember or think of

lexUnit.name: reminder.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a thing that causes someone to remember something.

lexUnit.name: evocative.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: evoking strong images, memories, or feelings.

lexUnit.name: evocation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the event of causing to come to mind.

lexUnit.name: suggest.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: prompt a mental image or emotion in an audience
